subject: My first Ghost Box Reply Recorded & Needed Audobe Audition Help
author: eastern_paranormal
full_text:
I uploaded my first Ghost Box recording to my EVP file today. I used 
the same process cleaning it up with Audobe Audition I use with my 
EVP's but it seems to need more. Does anyone have Audobe Audition 
advice for cleaning up that radio static?

Gab
